document_data.name: ''Spikevine Club''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Spikevine clubs''''' were [[enchanted]] [[club]]s wielded by [[druid]]s. They could be found in [[Waterdeep]] as of the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: True to the name, a ''spikevine club'' was a gnarled piece of wood covered in spikes and entwined by a thorny vine.
document_data.Powers: Any who were struck by the club risked serious injury, but so too did their nearby allies. At unpredictable intervals, a ''spikevine club'' might lash out at nearby foes upon tasting the blood of an enemy.
